title: World Cricket Championship Pro v5.1.4
description:
'World Cricket Championship' is a pack of three of the most exciting cricket games in the world:

World Cricket Championship
World Premier League
Fantasy Cricket League

In two modes of play: 'Tournament' and 'Quick Play'. Have all the time in the world? Then go for the 'Tournament' mode for unlimited hours of fun. Have time just for a quickie? Then choose 'Quick Play' and enjoy some intense thrill.

Challenge your Friend: How good a player are you? Find out by inviting your friends and challenging them to better your score.

Highly entertaining, with rich visuals, realistic animation and crisp camera movements....the games will transport you into the arena of international cricket.

If you are in the mood for some mischievous fun, then Fantasy Cricket League will give you plenty of opportunities to vent your devilish streaks!

So, whichever game you choose to play, the thrills, fun, and high voltage dramas are guaranteed!

Features:

- Tournament and Quick Play modes
- Challenge a Friend: asynchronous Multiplayer mode
- Leaderboard
- Create your own team: add your friends
- Components like 'Power-ups' in Fantasy Cricket League. Can be purchased using points collected in all the three games
- High quality graphics and 3D characters
- Multiple camera set-ups and follow through camera movements
- Ultra slow motion shots for massive sixes
- Action Replay On/Off
- Professional commentary

What's New: (Updated: October 11, 2013)

- Minor bug fixes
